Building Communities provides particular support to BAME and marginalised women, 50yr+, lone parents, vulnerable, asylum seekers, refugees and NEETS who have no skills, no confidence, residential status issues and thus do not meet eligibility criteria to enrol onto government funded programmes, due to these reasons and barriers.
